Atavistic {5}{C}{U} [i](You may cast this spell as a 7/7 colorless Eldrazi creature for {5}{C}{U}.)[/i]
Whenever Polarity Extruder deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library. If they exiled a nonland card, you may draw a card. Otherwise, create a Scion token. [i](It’s a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature with “Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}.”)[/i]
